summary: A modest Player House set in Dragon Bridge
descriptionHtml:
Hi,

Thank you for downloading and trying my Player House Mod.

SM_House_Mod_1-1.esp needs to be installed in your Skyrim Data folder. 

The Nexus Mod Manager should install it with no trouble.

If you head over to Arcadia\'s Cauldron in Whiterun, you will find a letter on the counter.

The letter informs you of the untimely death of the Mighty Warrior SoulMaster, and that you the player have inherited his modest house.

The House is located in Dragon Bridge.

There are one or two interesting items to find in the house and surrounding area.
Can you discover SoulMaster\'s Secret?!

Included is the Bow from my previous Mod - SoulMaster\'s Doom Bow and Soul Arrows. I have lowered the power on the bow for this mod to take it out of the Godly Items Category. It is however, still very powerful!

All crafting is catered for in the House with A Blacksmith\'s Forge, Workbench and Grindstone. A Tanning Rack, An Enchanting Table and Alchemy Table. 
In the garden is a Smelter and veg plot and chickens wander around too. Cooking is catered for as well.

A new bridge adjacent to the Dragon Bridge affords access to the House.

There are some lovely views from the surrounding area.

Please feel free to leave feedback and help me improve the mod with your suggestions?

Known issues:

Bookshelves currently do not work correctly - will be fixed in the next update.

Version History:

1.0 
Initial release required Dawnguard and Hearthfire to run

1.1 
Fixed File Header now does not need Dawnguard or Hearthfire!
Added chimney smoke

Other Mods I have done that may interest you:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26201
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27599
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27591
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26099

[color=#00FFFF]Please take note: If you are using a pirated (ie non Steam enabled) version of the game, please do not leave comments about how this part of my mod or that is not working on your game! I am not prepared to waste my time trying to help you out with your illegal software! I\'m unemployed, but still manage to pay for my games (they are what keep me sane) so if I can, you should be able to as well![/color]

SoulMasterII

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/sm0g9rv24znf_zps9d795d9a.gif[/IMG]

[color=#FFFF00]Please, DO NOT upload any part of my mods anywhere else![/color]
author: SoulMasterII
